short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip past all the waffle and get to the actual recipe on a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension for people who are sick of clicking on cool looking recipe websites, only to have to scroll for 500 years just to get to the actual recipe. 

This extension automatically finds the actual recipe and scrolls down to it, so you don't have to!
